description.value: Your connection to the First World has grown, and its vital energy flows into you rapidly. If you rest for 10 minutes, you regain Hit Points equal to your [[/r (@actor.abilities.con.mod*(floor(@actor.level/2)))[vitality,healing] #Vivacious Conduit]]{Constitution modifier Ã— half your level}. This is a healing vitality effect and is cumulative with any healing you receive from @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Treat Wounds].
